comments.body: Tried to move some of the functions in `pkg/api/v1/service` and `pkg/api/service` here instead of duplicating it, but with the way they were used in internal registry / validation made it messy so just straight up duplicating the file seemed simpler.
can't call methods here because we'd have to import internal APIs to external repos and that would fail import restrictions

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +26,30 @@
/*
This file is duplicated from "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/service/util.go"
in order for in-tree cloud providers to not depend on internal packages.
*/
